mapper.insert: insert into im_message(session_id, user_id, message_type, message_info) values (#{sessionId}, #{userId}, #{messageType}, #{messageInfo})
mapper.select: select im_message.id, im_message.session_id, im_message.user_id, im_message.message_type, im_message.message_info, im_message.create_time from im_message where im_message.id = #{id}
